title: Wanted: 1909-10 T209 & T210 Rocky Mount & Fayetteville cards
author: rhettyeakley

posts.post_title: Wanted: 1909-10 T209 & T210 Rocky Mount & Fayetteville cards
posts.post_content:
I would like to pick up the following cards, condition isn't really important as long as they are presentable and on the T209-2's I would prefer no major chipping on the front (but a little is okay).

1909 T209-1 Color:
Bourquise, Rocky Mount

1910 T209-2
Rocky Mount:
Bonner, Creagan, Forque, Gastmeyer, Gillespie, Novak, Phealean
Fayetteville:
Boyle, Dobson, Galvin, Luyster, Walters, Waymack

1910 T210-7
Rocky Mount:
Bonner, Cooney, Creager, Dobbs, Forgue, Gastmeyer(bat), Gastmeyer(field), Gillespie, Griffin, Morris, Munson, Noval, Phelan, Reeves
Fayetteville:
Cantwell, Dwyer, Galvin, Hartley, Luyster, Mayer, O'Halloran, Schumaker

email me at [url]rhettyeakley@netzero.com[/url] if you have any of these available,
-Rhett
